content: Stock price of tata motors.
According to the latest available information, the stock price of Tata Motors is Rs. 682.75 on both NSE and BSE as of June 26, 2025.

How are you?

I'm doing well, thank you for asking! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have feelings or emotions like humans do, so I don't have good or bad days. I'm always ready to assist you with any questions or tasks you may have.
Current stock price of tata motors.
According to the latest available information, the current stock price of Tata Motors is Rs. 691.
Tell me one shayari.
Here's one: "चराग़ रूपक है नेक और भले आदमी का, उसके सन्दर्भ से रोशनी रूपक है नेकी और भलाई का।" (Charaag roopak hai nek aur bhale aadmi ka, uske sandarbh se roshni roopak hai neki aur bhalaai ka.)
Tell me one wonderful shayari in hindi.
Here's one: "बेमतलब की ज़िन्दगी का सिलसिला ख़त्म, अब जिस तरह की दुनिया उस तरह के हम।" (Bematlab ki zindagi ka silsila khatm, ab jis tarah ki duniya us tarah ke hum.)
Tell me a great shayari in hindi.
Here's one: "मैं करूँ भी तो किस बात का घमंड?" (Main karun bhi to kis baat ka ghamand?)

Jarvis has stole a great shayari and stole the song which you have stolen?

I think there's been a misunderstanding! As a responsible AI assistant, I don't steal or plagiarize content, including shayaris or songs. The concept of stealing or copying someone else's work is not acceptable, and I always strive to maintain the highest level of integrity and originality in my responses.
